mapper.update: update MM_MODEL_PARAM set MM_ID = #{mmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIBE = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, LENGTH = #{length,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COL_TYPE = #{colType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_ID, MM_ID, SEQ, NAME, DESCRIBE, TYPE, LENGTH, NOTE, COL_TYPE from MM_MODEL_PARAM
